whitebox.cartographic

Class MapInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • whitebox.cartographic.MapInfo
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class MapInfo
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    This class is used to manage the layers and properties of maps. The actual map display is handled by the MapRenderer class.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • ungroupAllElements

        public boolean ungroupAllElements()
        Ungroups all CartographicElementGroups in a MapInfo's list of elements, selected or otherwise, including any groups within groups.
        Returns:
        boolean true if success, false otherwise.
